title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 482/84 of 24 February 1984 amending for the second time Regulation (EEC) No 3322/82 as regards the detailed rules for the application of the special measures for peas and field beans
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 482/84
of 24 February 1984
amending for the second time Regulation (EEC) No 3322/82 as regards the detailed rules for the application of the special measures for peas and field beans
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The second paragraph of Article 2 of Regulation (EEC) No 3322/82 is hereby replaced by the following:
'However, Article 1 (5), (12) and (13) shall apply from 1 August 1982 and Article 1 (6) shall apply from 1 January 1983.'

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 February 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
